name: MacBook Pro 16-inch M3
description: Apple MacBook Pro with M3 chip, 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Perfect for professional work, creative projects, and demanding applications.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: Ultra-portable laptop with 13th Gen Intel Core i7, 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, 16GB LPDDR5, 1TB SSD. Sleek design meets powerful performance.

name: Gaming Desktop PC - RTX 4070
description: High-performance gaming desktop with NVIDIA RTX 4070, AMD Ryzen 7 7700X, 32GB DDR5 RAM, 1TB NVMe SSD. Ready for 4K gaming and content creation.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max 256GB
description: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max with A17 Pro chip, 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, triple-camera system with 5x zoom, and titanium design.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra with S Pen, 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 200MP camera, 12GB RAM, 512GB storage. The ultimate Android flagship.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google Pixel 8 Pro with Google Tensor G3, 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, advanced AI photography features, and 7 years of OS updates.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life, multipoint connection, and premium sound quality.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
description: Apple AirPods Pro with Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, and up to 6 hours of listening time. Includes MagSafe charging case.

name: JBL Charge 5 Portable Speaker
description: Waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker with 20 hours of playtime, powerbank feature, and JBL Pro Sound with optimized long excursion driver.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 24.2MP sensor, 8K video recording, in-body image stabilization, and advanced autofocus system.

name: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
description: A captivating novel by Taylor Jenkins Reid about the reclusive Hollywood icon who finally decides to tell her story to an unknown journalist.

name: Atomic Habits
description: James Clear's transformative book on building good habits and breaking bad ones. Learn the proven framework for improving every area of your life.

name: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
description: Robert C. Martin's essential guide to writing clean, maintainable code. Learn the principles and practices of professional software development.

name: The Pragmatic Programmer
description: David Thomas and Andrew Hunt's classic guide to becoming a better programmer. 20th Anniversary Edition with updated content and new insights.

name: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
description: The original straight fit jeans. Made with premium denim and the classic 5-pocket styling that started it all. Available in multiple washes.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The iconic basketball shoe that changed the game. Classic white leather construction with perforations for breathability and Nike Air cushioning.

name: Zara Women's Cropped Blazer
description: Elegant cropped blazer with lapel collar, long sleeves, and front button fastening. Perfect for professional and casual styling.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
description: Revolutionary running shoes with BOOST midsole technology, Primeknit upper, and Continental rubber outsole for superior grip and comfort.

name: IKEA MALM Bed Frame
description: Modern bed frame with clean lines and a timeless design. Available in white stained oak veneer. Includes adjustable bed sides and slatted bed base.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker
description: 7-in-1 multi-use programmable pressure cooker: pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, sauté, yogurt maker, and warmer.

name: Weber Genesis II E-315 Gas Grill
description: 3-burner gas grill with GS4 grilling system, porcelain-enameled cast iron cooking grates, and built-in lid thermometer. Perfect for outdoor cooking.

name: Peloton Bike+
description: Premium indoor exercise bike with 23.8-inch rotating HD touchscreen, auto-follow resistance, and access to thousands of live and on-demand classes.

name: REI Co-op Quarter Dome SL 2 Tent
description: Ultralight backpacking tent for 2 people. Features color-coded clips, pre-bent poles, and a footprint included. Perfect for backpacking adventures.

name: Hydro Flask Standard Mouth Water Bottle
description: 32 oz insulated stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and dishwasher safe.

name: Herman Miller Aeron Chair
description: Iconic ergonomic office chair with 8Z Pellicle suspension, PostureFit SL back support, and fully adjustable design. Size B (Medium).
